parameters.name: DBNodeIds
parameters.description: The ID of the node. You can specify multiple node IDs. Separate multiple node IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: FromTimeService
parameters.description: Specifies whether to immediately run the task to modify parameters and restart the cluster. Valid values: false: runs the task on schedule. true: runs the task immediately. Default value: false.

parameters.name: ParameterGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the parameter template that is used for the cluster.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The JSON string that specifies the parameter and its value.

parameters.name: PlannedEndTime
parameters.description: The latest start time to run the task. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PlannedStartTime
parameters.description: The earliest start time to run the task to upgrade the kernel version of the cluster. The task runs within a specified period of time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
